website_summaries.verdict: Choose this liner if you want bold colors and a classic brush applicator that is simple to learn to use and control.
pros: Has a thin, flexible brush that's perfect for drawing thin lines close to the lashes, but is also buildable for thicker lines
Made by Revlon, a name that many makeup enthusiasts know and trust
Wears a long time for most users
cons: Some customers gripe about red, watery eyes after application
May get flaky after several hours of wear, and smudge on oily skin

website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice for buyers wanting an inexpensive product with a particularly skinny liner tip.
pros: Felt liner tip is 0.1mm for an extremely thin and precise application
Skinny design works well for lower lash wear
Easy to create wings with its thin tip
cons: Difficult to keep application steady with the ultra-fine tip

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a liquid eyeliner for a price that's a fraction of the cost of premium brands, this long-wearing Revlon liner is the one for you.
pros: A liquid eyeliner by a trusted brand in cosmetics that can easily be used to apply ultra-thin lines
Can also be layered for bolder looks, and is great for wings and cat eyes
Colors are highly pigmented and provide decent wear for most consumers after it dries
cons: Will smudge if you touch it before it dries, and doesn't wear as well on oily skin
A few reports of eyes becoming irritated after wearing it

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner For Wings
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite eyeliners, and it's a bit cheaper to purchase online than instore. I love the thin applicator; it's perfect for doing an extremely thin winged eyeliner look, which I do frequently. The product itself lasts fairly long, only needing to be reapplied once during the day. It's not really a matte eyeliner though, it has a sheen, so if that's what you're looking for then this won't be it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye liner. I have this color and the brown color. I have tried pretty much every liquid eye liner on the market but this is the only one that I kept going back to over the years. The skinny version is great for very fine lines (I make a conservative little cateye swoop on mine) and the regular is good for everyday liner.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, even with a super steady hand, precise application with the skinny stick takes too long to achieve. I prefer the thicker tip eyeliner applicator (I took a picture of both the skinny tip & thicker tip for reference). The thicker tip is more sturdy, and easier for me to apply. Same great formula, but I won't be purchasing the skinny stick to help me in the application of my eye liner anymore. It's just too flimsy and difficult to control. I like to do the cat eye look occasionally & I was hoping the skinny stick would help with that.
customer_reviews.author: SingleClutchMom

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who likes to do wings on her eyes sometimes. This works perfect. Fine lines and it goes on easy and stay puts. Last all day.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is the only eyeliner brush that can run a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner brush that can run a pin-thin line right along your lashes with no gap. You can draw one line that looks bronzey- brown or let it dry and draw over the first line for a really dark mahogony. Beats out any other liner.
customer_reviews.author: G. Beres

customer_reviews.title: My go-to eyeliner since high school
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this stuff for about a decade now and it's consistently my fav eyeliner, despite trying other brands/kinds. The felt tip is thin, making it great for wings/detailed looks. That being said, a tube usually only lasts a few weeks to a month - the felt usually starts to rub and it ends up getting little pieces on it which don't make for a clean line. Sort of sucks when you realize it in the morning when you're rushing to put on make-up, but it makes for a great reminder to replace the product regularly since, like any other mascara/eyeliner/liquid product, it's esp prone to collect bacteria fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof, nor long lasting :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyeliner because of all the good reviews it had, but was greatly disappointed. PROS- Nice thin brush, good dark black color and glides on easily. CONS- Absolutely NOT waterproof, nor long lasting. Wiped off easily with a little moisture/water. This item should be listed as a regular black eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Friendly !
customer_reviews.text: Personally myself I am new to liquid eyeliner since I’ve always heard they were a struggle , but this eyeliner is great to practice with and it is affordable has a very nice brush and is easy to remove and doesn’t cause extreme irritation after taking it off with a makeup wipe after several attempts to create the perfect wing 10/10 recommend for beginners overall happy with product (let me know if this was helpful thanks :) !)
customer_reviews.author: Vany

customer_reviews.title: Not matte
customer_reviews.text: I really like this formula. I was expecting a dark brown, which it is --- with a healthy touch of bronze shimmer. I could live with the shimmer, I suppose, because I really like the applicator and formula, except the shimmer makes it look really uneven and like it skipped around. It's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star Reader

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every kind of highly touted eyeliner including Lauder, Arden, Bobbi Brown, etc., etc...and keep going back to this one. I'm older now and my fine motor skills are not as steady as in the past and this product goes on finely, by that i mean a very fine line and doesn't yell "hey I'm wearing eyeliner! I have allergies to a lot of makeup regardless of price and labels and this one causes no itching or breakouts. Difficult to find sometimes that is why I order it. Great product, great price and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Ludie

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It is not waterproof. Doesn't state that on the packaging or tube and definitely comes off if it gets wet. So if you are looking for waterproof eyeliner, this isn't the one you want. Pretty much false advertising. Waterproof claim is the reason I bought it. Will keep because its too much of a hassle to send back, but will have to be careful not to wear it when there is a chance I could cry, get caught in a rainstorm, get splashed in the face, sweat, swim .... you get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Lee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!! Finally found the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! This even beats my high end fine liquid liner! This one stays on all day, doesn't flake (and I have super oily eyelids). I went to wash my face at night and was super surprised to see it still on!! I even rubbed my eyes twice because i forgot i had it on! It goes on super easy with this tip. I was looking for a felt tip that achieves a fine line and this is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dalia A.

customer_reviews.title: horrible do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible, I should have sent it back. It is not smudgeproof or long wearing in my opinion. It has an glaring glitter shimmer (not mentioned ) in the description. If I wanted a teenage glitter eye liner I would have ordered one, I thought I was purchasing brown eyeliner as described in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Marburger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Liner... Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have found the perfect Navy Blue liner!!!!! It is not glittery or metallic! It’s a deep navy so it’s not showing ‘blue’. The application is flawless because of the formula and the applicator brush. So smooth and dries quickly. Once it’s on, it’s on all day and night!
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Radiant Copper Glow...Gorgeous for blue eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color! It's a warm, coppery-brown. Not too dark or harsh. It goes on with a skinny line, and stays on all day. I like that I can keep it skinny, or take a brush and make a warm, blended line. Tenacious wear, yet comes off easily with regular cleanser and water. Can't be without this!
customer_reviews.author: HeartofAvalon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent color for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to eyeliner for the price and results. I really like the tiny brush, and find the product has good coverage and isn't water-y. It's not a water-proof eyeliner so obviously it isn't water-proof, but on my skin it wears well throughout the day, yet isn't difficult to wash off with water. Doesn't flake and doesn't leave a ton of black residue after washing with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: InvaderRox

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying I'm terrible at eyeliner! I've tried numerous products but none of them worked until I found this one. I love how skinny the brush is, i dont wear thick liner, i try to keep a natural look so it's easier to achieve with this specific brush. The quality is great it stays on all day, doesn't flake, and washes off with facewash and water no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ciara bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very good price very good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this liquid eye liner. And I am super impressed with it because now that I am in my mid 50's your skin can get loose other eyeliners used to rub again my upper eye and leave a mark. This has only happened to me twice with this product . So in essence it goes on great and dries quickly so it does not smudge
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Maestre

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I never tried any eyeliner from Revlon before and let me just say...I love this eyeliner! The brush is a felt brush and picks up the perfect amount of liquid for either a thin or thick eyeliner look. The navy blue really stands out and I get compliments at work whenever I wear it. I wish they sold these at my drugstores because these eyeliners are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great applicator, lasts long, very precise soft applicator for a marker/mat black!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the applicator tip, easy to use with a flexible tip that smoothes on like a brush but not hard like a marker tip applicator that can be hard on the tops of your lids. I really love the mat finish when it dries! Looks classy chic and a nice alternative to the liquid eyeliners that dry super shiny, (more cosmetic companies should take notice)!!! Will be ordering more to alternate with another brush liquid liner I use frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best liquid eyeliner I have ever used and a perfect green color. The brush is really thin so it is easy to avoid making the line too thick. I’ve been using this product for years!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My ride or die liner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is the one that really let me learn how to do makeup. The felt brush allows a sharp and beautiful wing, it dries matte, and never runs throughout the day. I will grab this liner any time over an expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: G.Goetzinger

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the description says “Waterproof” however the product I got is not. Nowhere in the packaging or the product specify “waterproof”
customer_reviews.author: Indira Anupindi

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eyeliner a lot. It’s dark black, matte, and dries completely. I’ve used other brands that don’t dry down so then you get a smudge on your upper eyelid, but I don’t get that with this. It doesn’t melt or slide around in the Florida heat but it’s easy to remove at the end of the day. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: The Best - User of 10 Years
customer_reviews.text: I am a massive fan of winged eyeliner. I have been wearing it since I was 12 year olds and I've tried every brand from drugstore to high end -- but I always come back to this eyeliner. It's so deep and dark and it goes on perfectly. The tip is skinny enough to make a sharp point. It comes off easily if you need an adjustment, but does not wear off with daily wear. It's not waterproof, so don't wear it swimming (or in the rain), but for a normal every day activity, this is the ONE. Highly recommend. From a long time, 10 year, dedicated user!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof or even smudge proof
customer_reviews.text: Smears around your eye after an hour wearing it. Bold dark black but not smudge proof and definitely not waterproof like it says. The package doesn’t say waterproof but smudge proof which it isn’t anyway. Great look just not great wear for all day. Melts off you face.
customer_reviews.author: Cat339

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very nicely, but does not stay on at all & is definitely NOT waterproof whatsoever. I will not reorder because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect line everytime!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye liner by far! I've used so many different liners, liquid and pencil and this is the best one I've found. It makes a perfect line EVERY SINGLE TIME, no bleeding or smearing. Easy to fix if you mess up (I use eye makeup remover and a q-tip) and looks fantastic even after a long day at work. Makes a solid, dark, bold line. Will be buying again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, precise, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner and wear it every day. Lasts all day, washes off easily, doesn't bother my sensitive skin. The felt tip brush is the best, most accurate applicator I've found. The mahogany color has a little bit of shine to it, but is still subtle. This is the third bottle I've bought, and I will buy it again. Wish they made it in purple!
customer_reviews.author: Star Woman

customer_reviews.title: Joe mama wasn’t ready for this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: Look I’m no eyeliner queen but let me just tell you this eyeliner has been my number one since the start of my journey. It’s really easy to learn winged eyeliner with so you can be flying away from all these haters. It amazes me because it stays on tight and strong the whole day but will remove with water instantly. No harsh rubbing. Again.. great for when you are trying to learn winged eyeliner. Overall a great product and got my dads gf hooked on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Dat girl

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long. But when it fades its glittery.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but i didn't realize it was metallic. Its brown with copper glitters. Which is pretty but i needed matte. I guess i didnt read it? It works good super fine tipped. I'd say get a thicker tip for a cat eye. Its good for drawing designs though. When it fades it turns into a glittery mess and can look inky.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: but I've had better. I've used their regular liquid eyeliner and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner was okay, but I've had better. I've used their regular liquid eyeliner and I felt like it stayed on longer. This stuff crumbles off in little chunks sometimes, which is a bummer because I'm a huge fan of doing wings and cat eye styled make up. However, application is really easy with the skinny applicator and allows me to have more precision. I'll probably look for something else next time though.
customer_reviews.author: Marievalenti

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It can’t get any worse . Eye liner is not smudge proof or water resistant. I attached some picture here so you can see what happened after wearing it for few hours. I didn’t rub my eyes or anything but it got smudged on my eyelid and under my eyes. Wasted my money and came back home looking like a ghost !
customer_reviews.author: Turzo Meem

customer_reviews.title: looks great on
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. I have to be careful and I am getting better because you have to apply it with a steady hand. But it looks great on you can do a thick line using more toward the outer eye area with a slight flip up on the end. It can be hard to do but practice makes perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as waterproof and it definitely does not say it is waterproof. It states “all day wear”
customer_reviews.author: divamom

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, complete misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT WATERPROOF or SWEAT PROOF. I am a server in Florida so the heat and humidity are a constant problem. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Starling

customer_reviews.title: Really recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is my second eyeliner from this brand and I am really fan of it! Duriability is in the best place. You can easily wash it while cleaning your face though it will not get washed away in the middle of a normal day while you want your makeup to be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Meer

customer_reviews.title: Nice liner that does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a watery mess of a liner for my daughter. This liner goes on well and stays where you put it. It does not easily come off with water/tears. Overall all this is a good buy and I recommend this liner to anyone looking for a low cost option that does what it should do.
customer_reviews.author: BGnuoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin and thick lines, precise and affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: If you like liquid eyeliner, this is a nice product to buy. Very easy to use and it is precise. It is not a brush like one, the tip is more like a spoungy type of material but it is flexible at the tip so you can draw a nice thin line. So far so good, not sure how long it lasts during the day I just used it. Will update if any bad experience. Otherwise, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: Tip could be better!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this, and although the color and the product is fine, I just don't like the tip of the applicator. It's too flexible and flimsy. I need it to be more stiff, so that I can draw a nice line. Because it's too flexible and flimsy, it takes a little more time and just a little harder to draw a line across the eyelid. Otherwise, it's good priced, and lasts long!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I have hooded eyes and this gives me a nice skinny line to help define my eyes, but not take over my lid space. Does not smudge and lasts all day which is also what I look for in a liquid eyeliner. It also dries quick so if you plan on smudging it, you have to act fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L.

customer_reviews.title: The tip is way too thin.
customer_reviews.text: My only complain is that he tip is way too thin. I always end up applying over again just to get the line a little bit thicker. I wish I would have ordered the thicker tip that I am used to using.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes (haven't found a mascara I can use yet!) but this eyeliner is my mainstay. It is easy to apply. It doesn't flake or cause irritation. The brush will allow a thin line if that is what you are after or, press a little harder for a thicker, bolder line. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: KMarsh_77

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use UD All Nighter setting spray as well as a black powder ti set my liner. This particular liner smudges like crazy no matter what I do. I have raccoon eyes within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a blue/navy liquid eyeliner for a few years. I recently received this one and out of all my liquid eyeliners it's by far my absolute favorite. Fine tip which controls how thick you want your line, dries to a beautiful navy, and doesn't wear off until I remove it. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Ritalicious9

customer_reviews.title: The LOOK
customer_reviews.text: I got that cat eye look real quick. No smudging and it doesn't transfer to my lids + it last me all work day. I really like how thin the applicator is because I get a nice and smooth sharp line. Be careful though, because it's not a firm tip. You need that steady - I didn't have 5 cups of coffee - artist hand or things can go south real quick. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Thin crisp lines and doesn't dry out!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner! It's gives clean, crisp lines. Easy to use, precise, and smooth. It's rich and dark and beautiful all day as long as you don't touch it! The product lasts way longer than the pen liquid eyeliners do. 5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great color, wish applicator tip was thicker
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in trying some new eyeliner colors and this one is such a great change-up from black or brown. It stays on well but I wish the applicator was just a little thicker because the thinness makes it hard to get a straight line. Wouldn't stop me from buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It comes on a nice black color. It does glide with ease. Because of its skinny brush, you’re able to make a precision wing. The only issue I have with it, is that it smudges really quick. I’ll wear it to work and by midday, my wing is almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Favorite eyeliner. The brush produces an even nice slim or wide line. I use the green and love it. Perfect color - like a green khaki.
customer_reviews.author: LAGK

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, takes practice to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice and the formula makes it easy to get products on your eyes. I will say it does take practice to use this, as do most eyeliners. I usually use the ELF felt tip eyeliner pen, so this was a bit different to use. Once you got it down, you can make your makeup stunning.
customer_reviews.author: flutistjimmy

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hot summer days
customer_reviews.text: It did not last "all day" when I used it. Honestly, maybe four hours on a hot summer day. Thus, you will need to reapply. I would also not recommend if you get allergies often since it will smudge and come off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revlon liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have never used liquid eyeliner before. I use eyeshadow to line top of eyelids and have used pencil eyeliner under my eyes. I was hoping this eyeliner would not smear and stay on longer . So far I can't tell... It does easily make a nice line and is a good color.
customer_reviews.author: kyri

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about it. It does go on smoothly and dries quickly. I also like the matte appearance. I expected it to last longer and not smudge. I’ve had to do some quick removal at work when accidentally smearing it. Soap and water takes it off.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Not stay proof
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t stay on me at all! Instantly watered and went away.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea murtha

customer_reviews.title: Dark, solid color. Sometimes inconsistent lines
customer_reviews.text: This color is true to it's advertisement, and is honestly quite wonderful! However, the inability to always see the density of liquid within the brush can result in some uneven application of lines. Otherwise, it is grand!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time in finding any eyeliner locally that wasn't black. The color is nice and the price is right. I can always count on Revlon to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Kimball

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner, it’s totally worth the price, very easy to use and stays all day. The thin brush really helps you make a thin line. I’ve already bought it twice and will continue to do so
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite color of eyeliner and looks good on us fair ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite color of eyeliner and looks good on us fair women...especially blonde and red heads...but I am finding it hard to find in my state. So glad it's here!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: After 2 hours, I look like I have dark circles.
customer_reviews.text: The brush is great, exactly how I wanted it to be. However it smudges. Not extremely, but enough to make your undereye darker like you have dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Jo

customer_reviews.title: Better for heavy,thick lines
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on well but I found it ran and caused clumps of it to accumulate in the tear duct area of the eye, looking awful. It's better, I think, for heavy lines and not makeup that looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: nursekate

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner smudged, not water proof. I’m in need of a water proof eyeliner because my eyes are very watery... this did not do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: OK. I never write reviews, but I had too write this one. This was the easiest liquid eyeliner I have ever used. the applicator makes it so easy to put this on straight and even. I have bought 6 more just to make sure I have a supply.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Cam

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great colour, albeit a bit sheer. I would’ve liked it to be matte compared to shimmery, but the skinny brush and the price make it worth it. I use an angled brush dipped in black eyeshadow to stamp over the liner once it’s applied, to darken, mattify, and smoke it out.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Will be sure to buy the regular liner next time
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Revlon liquid liner. I failed the realize the 'skinny' description of this purchase. The applicator is long and very thin. I have had a much harder time keeping a clean line with this applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Very easy application
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find a darker green eyeliner anywhere. Sephora discontinued theirs. This is a great substitute
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K. Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: The Brush is really nice
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice, the end of the brush is super skinny and it is easy to use. On another note the bottle seems SO SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The applicator tip is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The tip of the applicator is not very firm and is very flimsy. I am used to a more firmer tip. The liquid itself is very good and water proof
customer_reviews.author: MissMissy

customer_reviews.title: Domt use anywhere near your tears .perrfect skinny handle
customer_reviews.text: Its not watery resistant .it ok becuas of the price but i hate that when it dries its not bold black its very dull lookimg and i stoppped using it because it gets messy
customer_reviews.author: exotic

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner, unlike Maybelline, has the most flexible applicator brush. It is reasonably priced and is long lasting, all the qualities I am looking for in an eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make a line close to lashes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this - easy to put on close to lash line. I don’t wear mascara so this emphasizes my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Farfal

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it applies, it does smear easily and transfers to the eyelid if you don’t let it dry right after applying or if you’re a heavy blinker.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: love the color
customer_reviews.text: Could not find it in stores anymore. I like the color very much. Performs well. Holds up for long day.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy🌼

customer_reviews.title: The best ever. You won't find another like it
customer_reviews.text: I am a definite high end makeup user. Everything I wear is about 20 dollars or more. This is the only eyeliner that works with my aging eyes. I have loose skin on my eyelids and the applicator on this eyeliner is the best. And the formula itself is matte af. The best.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and forgiving application
customer_reviews.text: This was the first brand of liquid eyeliner that I was actually able to use and not look ridiculous. I love that the thin tip makes application very forgiving for shaky beginner hands.
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It goes on smoothly and doesn’t tug on the eye lid. The color stays put and the brush is thin and fine which allows you to apply your liner very easily. I have the navy shock which looks very nice on.
customer_reviews.author: SerenitySeeker

customer_reviews.title: Not actually black.
customer_reviews.text: The color ends up being a greyish black instead of black. Still looks nice tho. Just a warning
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Liquid eyeliner itself is fine but didn’t like the tip
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the stick that it came with to apply the liquid eyeliner. I was looking for more of a stiff Felt tip I felt like it hard to control it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Berge

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect--gorgeous and long-lasting!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly remarkable eyeliner--not sure why I've never seen it before. It's easy to apply, is foolproof, in fact; stays on better than most other liquid liners AND is a subtle exclamation point (if those are the right words) when wearing a trio of brown eyeshadows (try Lorac's trio)!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use & remove, fully black and matte
customer_reviews.text: Fully black and matte. The tip is easy to hold and manoeuvre, very fine and gives me good control to do something like a wing tip. Because the tip is very fine you might have to apply it twice if you want a thicker application. But the colour itself is very matte and applying just once gives a great result. It seems to be waterproof, so far at least. Comes off easily with most make up removers/moisturisers. Very easy to use and remove.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something inexpensive to practice doing my winged liner and this is perfect. It’s a nice matte black that doesn’t smear
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, comes on dark, lasts all day, and has super thin tip for nice skinny lines so you don't look like the lead in a slasher flick. I'be also had it for like 3 months and it hasn't even come close to running o7t. When it looks like crap, it's because you suck, not it. Just kidding. Just make sure before using you make sure there'a not too much on the brush so you don't get a giant thick line on one end and a thin one on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Smudges
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fine applicator, it gives much more freedom and I got it right pretty easily. But the formula sucks, it never dries, so it gets smudged over your face if you touch it, even hours after appling it, this sucks I got home with a lot black spots all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Lotufo de Barros

customer_reviews.title: Cat-eye magic in a wand!
customer_reviews.text: Revlon Colorstay has been my mainstay eyeliner for over ten years and the source of my cat-eye power. I highly recommend it to anyone who loves dramatic and long lasting make-up!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy - especially useful for touching up around false eyelashes, but great alone, too. The flexible applicator makes for truly foolproof & precise application, and doesn't smear or fade. Also doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: seashore6Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Goes on skoothly, lasts most of the day
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eyeliner! It isn't waterproof but it doesn't claim to be. It's very easy to put on and take off. The skinny line is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina K.

customer_reviews.title: Best brush tip for winged liner
customer_reviews.text: The brush isn’t really a brush but more like a thin sponge? It’s perfect for very thin winged lines. Doesn’t smudge after drying but expect a good face scrubbing to get it off later
customer_reviews.author: Drea Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good but might fade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove so if you mess up while putting it on it’s a quick fix. This may be why it doesn’t last very long on the eye though. I can go all day without touching my wing and by the time I get home it’s faded and basically missing. But if you make sure you get a thick coat of it, this isn’t too big of a problem. Overall very easy to use and put on, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Quick makeup service
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and was exactly what I wanted. This product is difficult to find. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you are in show business!!!
customer_reviews.text: The liner was easy to remove but once it was on it didn’t smudge. I loved that so much because I bought the liner for a play I was going to be in. When you put water on it, it would start to clean off your face but it never fully came off. I needed to wear the eyeliner seven hours a day for a whole week and for the time that I was acting, singing, and dancing it stayed On my face without any smudges or wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Lorio

customer_reviews.title: Not really long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arizona and in the summer it gets really hot and sweaty. I found out that this eyeliner is not really good for a sweaty weather. Fades down my eyes after a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Rizzi

customer_reviews.title: Stings upon applying
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner stings immediately upon applying. I have tried two colors and they both burn. I replied to manufacturer but received no response. Never had this happen with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: MMH

customer_reviews.title: Smears
customer_reviews.text: Very fine line, goes on well but after a few hours it smeared all over my eye lid, not a flattering look. I won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lahdelove

customer_reviews.title: Smudges and not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Revlon advertises this won’t smudge. Not true. Smudges and is not waterproof. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color and line application
customer_reviews.text: I used to love another product called LA Splash but can't find it anymore. This copper colored eyeliner is great and the applicator makes nice smooth lines. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Ar Schneller

customer_reviews.title: Goes on Smooth
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is great. Very dark pigment and goes on smoothly. I am older now and have fine lines under my eyes so I need an eyeliner that does not skip. This fits the bill. I can now throw away the collection of similar eyeliners that do not work as well as this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like how it wears and I especially like how it just glides on my lids. A++. Fits perfect in my hand too.
customer_reviews.author: TheTush

customer_reviews.title: Comes off easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the way it goes on, but it does come off easily. Especially on the bottom. I have to clean under eyes so I don't look like a raccoon a at least twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cat eye
customer_reviews.text: This is now one of my favorite eyeliners. It lasts all day. Doesn’t smudge while applying and water resistant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and bold just don't get it wet whyle rubbing it
customer_reviews.text: Very dark bold black. Awsome eyeliner for wings to. Smudging is not bad...water resistant is ok for a few drops but if you rub it with water it comes right off like it was never there.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Bella

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay Skinny Liquid Eyeliner, Waterproof, Smudgeproof, Longwearing Eye Makeup with Ultra-fine Tip, Black Out (301)
product_meta.description: Color:301 Black OutFor the ultimate skinny line, Revlon ColorStay Skinny Liquid Liner is here. Its highly pigmented formula gives you bold, even, streak free color in a single stroke. With mistake proof control and non draggy application, the ultra fine 0.1mm tip makes it easier than ever to create a skinny, precise line. The liquid eyeliner’s longwear technology means you can wear it all day without worrying about smudging, fading or transfer. Plus, it’s ophthalmologist tested to be non irritating, suitable for contact lens wearers and safe for sensitive eyes. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer resistant lipstick and makeup.
feature_bullets: Highly pigmented formula gives you bold, even, streak free color in a single stroke
Ultra-fine 0.11 mm tip to create precise and sharp eye makeup looks
Long lasting ColorStay formula won't smudge, smear, or fade for up to 10 hours
Opthalmologist tested, suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers
Available in 2 shades, Mahogany Flame and Black Out
